snippet: The design of the Arcus Center for Social Justice Leadership in Kalamazoo, Mich., reflects the ideals behind the building’s creation.
abstract: Michael Kimmelman reviews newly-unveiled Arcus Center for Social Justice Leadership on the campus of Michigan's Kalamazoo College; notes that structure was designed by Chicago architecture firm Studio Gang under the leadership of Jeanne Gang.
lead_paragraph: The design of the Arcus Center for Social Justice Leadership in Kalamazoo, Mich., reflects the ideals behind the building’s creation.
